resetPassword.title: Lost Your Password?
resetPassword.subTitle: Don't worry, it happens to us all the time. Resetting your password is a snap. It only takes a few seconds.

dashboard.title: How can we help you?
dashboard.subtitle: Report a problem using one of the three buttons at the bottom and our technical department will contact you as soon as possible.

sidemenu.greeting: Hi there, we're here to help you!

reportCreate.title: Report a Problem
reportCreate.sectionSubTitle: If you experience a problem in your house or office, we want to help you.
reportCreate.reportCreatedDescription: Your report was created. Our support team will be in touch with you shortly.
reportCreate.reportProblemDescription: Please select the problem type that you're experiencing below
reportCreate.reportHouseDescription: Please select the area of the house where you're experiencing the problem
reportCreate.reportProblemTypeDescription: Please select the area of the house where you're experiencing the problem

login.title: Empecemos!
login.subTitle: La mejor y más confiable solución para seguridad, tecnología y audio para el negocio y el mercado interno.

resetPassword.title: ¿Perdiste tu contraseña?
resetPassword.subTitle: No te preocupes, nos pasa todo el tiempo. Restablecer su contraseña es muy fácil. Solo toma unos segundos.

dashboard.title: ¿Cómo podemos ayudarte?
dashboard.subtitle: Reporte un problema usando uno de los tres botones en la parte inferior y nuestro departamento técnico se pondrá en contacto con usted lo antes posible.
